reuters.title: REXNORD <REX> TO REDEEM RIGHTS
reuters.body: Rexnord Inc said it will redeem all of its preferred stock purchase rights for 10 cts a right effective today. Rexnord said the rights will be redeemed because it is expected its shares will be tendered under a January 30 takeover offer from Banner Acquisition Corp. The rights trade in tandem with Rexnord's common stock. Reuter 
